overview: Masseuse Chanel Preston teams up with her spa colleague Reena Sky to heal their client Abella Danger's sore ass. Masseuse Samantha Rone comes up with a surefire plan when she's tempted by Mia Malkova's beauty. Spencer Scott breaks out the bolster pillow to properly massage her client Leah Gotti's tight ass muscles. Bombshell Blair Williams satisfies her sexual appetite when she books a last minute massage with Abby Cross.
title: In Need of Assistance
